entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpRequest.BodyReader.TryRead returns false even though request has a body #55615
  • ASP.NET 8 + ANGULAR Template with Docker breaks the SPA proxy #55614
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #55610
  • Perf improvement: json #55609
  • Blazor EditForm Enhance=True with StreamRendering #55608
  • FileStreamResult resulting in significantly more I/O than client is requesting #55606
  • Add documentation for AuthenticateResult.Fail failureMessage parameter. #55602
    Backlog
  • Blazor hot reloading not working with referenced assembly #55601
  • Kestrel will not accept new connection. #55599
  • close connection after HEAD handler executed #55598
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55596
  • New Project Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Garnet #55593

Closed

  • Crash due to INVALID_POINTER_READ_c0000005_aspnetcorev2_inprocess.dll!STRU::SafeVsnwprintf #54673
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, single_query, updates #55561
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json_spring #55570
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #55607
  • Results.Json(null) stopped producing a response body in .NET 8 (and 7) #53509
  • How to get access token in Blazor server with Azure B2C #55578
  • Checkbox input tag helper throws FormatException: 1 is not a valid value for Boolean #55512
  • Meaningless error when using both Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect 8.0.4 and System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt 7.5.0 or higher #55194
  • OpenIdConnect .well-known/openid-configuration partially read #55355
  • Garnet Microsoft.Extensions.Caching “ERR unknown command” #55594
  • Add HttpConnectAttribute #52380
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55589
  • Error "InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains more than one matching element" in Swagger when using minimal api with the header versioning #54623
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Stop retrying template tests #55605
    * NO MERGE *
  • [Blazor] Avoid validating antiforgery for non form data content types #55604
    area-blazor
  • Fix flaky CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState test variations #55603
    area-blazor
  • Covariant THub-Parameter #55600
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Fix typo in IUserClaimStore.cs #55547
    area-identity, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `77afe8e` to `d83fee1` #55448
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `44db12e` to `1c23eb1` #55449
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/2.1] Stop using -pt images #55463
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Adds static asset endpoints, serve compressed assets #55558
    area-blazor
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #55229
    area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
